item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to delimit; to transfer; to assign; to differentiate; to mark off; to draw (a line); to delete; stroke of a Chinese character
2: draw a line
item.A:
划 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 劃
1: huà 2: huá
计划 (計劃) jìhuà plan; project; program; to plan; to map out 有计划 (有計劃) yǒujìhuá to have plans

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to undertake; to carry; to shoulder; to take responsibility
2: a picul (100 catties, 50 kg.); two buckets full
item.A:
traditional: 擔
1: dān 2: dàn
担任 (擔任) dānrèn to hold a governmental office or post; to assume office of; to take charge of; to serve as 担子 (擔子) dànzi load; a carrying pole and the loads on it

item.Q:
Write the character:
to exert; to strive
item.A:
nǔ
努力 nǔlì great effort; strive; try hard

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname Guo; outer city wall
item.A:
郭 (strokes unavailable)
guō
郭沫若 GuōMòruò Guo Moruo (1892~1978), writer, communist party intellectual and cultural apparatchik

item.Q:
Write the character:
apologize; deficient; to regret
item.A:
歉 (strokes unavailable)
qiàn
道歉 dàoqiàn to apologize; to make an apology

traditional: 紙
zhǐ
报纸 (報紙) bàozhǐ newspaper; newsprint

item.Q:
Write the character:
to stick; to paste; to keep close to; to fit snugly; subsidize; allowance
item.A:
贴 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 貼
tiē

àn
黑暗 hēiàn dark; darkly; darkness

item.Q:
Write the character:
to call; to cry; to shout; to breath out; to exhale
item.A:
呼 (strokes unavailable)
hū
呼吸 hūxī breathe

item.Q:
Write the character:
to stop; cease; dismiss; suspend; to quit; to finish
item.A:
罢 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 罷
bà
罢工 (罷工) bàgōng strike; go on strike

item.Q:

opportunely; coincidentally; as it happens; skillful; timely
item.A:
巧 (strokes unavailable)
qiǎo

慧 (strokes unavailable)
huì
智慧 zhìhuì wisdom; knowledge

item.Q:
Write the character:
to bore through; pierce; perforate; penetrate; pass through; to dress; to wear; to put on; to thread
item.A:
chuān
穿着 (穿著) chuānzhuó dress; to wear; clothes; attire

详 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 詳
xiáng
详细 (詳細) xiángxì detailed; in detail; minute

雷 (strokes unavailable)
léi
雷雨 léiyǔ thunderstorm

item.Q:
Write the character:
cooperate; harmonize; to help; to assist; to join
item.A:
协 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 協
xié
协定 (協定) xiédìng (reach an) agreement; protocol

督 (strokes unavailable)
dū
监督 (監督) jiāndū to control; to supervise; to inspect
